meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Sonmor Sandy Hollimon Scott Harris Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6070.

td.p: Amanda Sonmor, a virtual assistant originally from Denver, Colorado
Sandy Hollimon, a college instructor of anthropology from Jenner, California
Scott Harris, a videographer and elementary school librarian from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,201)

tr.td: PRESIDENT TYLER
SCI-FI TV
WE OWN YOU
(Alex: You have to name the parent company.)
PLUTO: NEVER FORGET!
ALL THINGS CONSIDERED
THIS IS N-P-R
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "N", and it will be followed at some point with a "P" and an "R".)

Scott
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Scott
Sandy
Amanda
CLASSICAL MUSIC
I'M SO THEATRICAL
LOUISIANA LORE
ALSO ON THE MONOPOLY BOARD
WORLD LITERATURE
JOB HUNTING
(Alex: The correct response in that category for each clue will be made up of letters in the clue in order.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Scott
Sandy
Amanda

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Amanda\'s response] The world of Dan Brown and the Illuminati.)
...
(Alex: [Revealing Scott\'s response] Oh, gosh, you forgot an "S". Oh! It\'s gonna cost you. Sorry!)
AmandaWhat is Angels & Demons?
$4,700
ScottWhat is Angels & Demon?
$6,201
Angels & Demons')

Sandy
Amanda
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $12,300

Sandy
Amanda

22 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

7 R,
8 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
